ROOT:
-- DaoORDERS2_D2_Select -- 2014/2/9 日立 太郎 SELECT "OrderID", "CustomerID", "EmployeeID", "OrderDate", "RequiredDate", "ShippedDate", "ShipVia", "Freight", "ShipName", "ShipAddress", "ShipCity", "ShipRegion", "ShipPostalCode", "ShipCountry" FROM "ORDERS2"
WHERE AND "OrderID" = :OrderIDAND "OrderID" IS NULL AND "OrderID" LIKE :OrderID_Like ESCAPE '\' AND "CustomerID" = :CustomerIDAND "CustomerID" IS NULL AND "CustomerID" LIKE :CustomerID_Like ESCAPE '\' AND "EmployeeID" = :EmployeeIDAND "EmployeeID" IS NULL AND "EmployeeID" LIKE :EmployeeID_Like ESCAPE '\' AND "OrderDate" = :OrderDateAND "OrderDate" IS NULL AND "OrderDate" LIKE :OrderDate_Like ESCAPE '\' AND "RequiredDate" = :RequiredDateAND "RequiredDate" IS NULL AND "RequiredDate" LIKE :RequiredDate_Like ESCAPE '\' AND "ShippedDate" = :ShippedDateAND "ShippedDate" IS NULL AND "ShippedDate" LIKE :ShippedDate_Like ESCAPE '\' AND "ShipVia" = :ShipViaAND "ShipVia" IS NULL AND "ShipVia" LIKE :ShipVia_Like ESCAPE '\' AND "Freight" = :FreightAND "Freight" IS NULL AND "Freight" LIKE :Freight_Like ESCAPE '\' AND "ShipName" = :ShipNameAND "ShipName" IS NULL AND "ShipName" LIKE :ShipName_Like ESCAPE '\' AND "ShipAddress" = :ShipAddressAND "ShipAddress" IS NULL AND "ShipAddress" LIKE :ShipAddress_Like ESCAPE '\' AND "ShipCity" = :ShipCityAND "ShipCity" IS NULL AND "ShipCity" LIKE :ShipCity_Like ESCAPE '\' AND "ShipRegion" = :ShipRegionAND "ShipRegion" IS NULL AND "ShipRegion" LIKE :ShipRegion_Like ESCAPE '\' AND "ShipPostalCode" = :ShipPostalCodeAND "ShipPostalCode" IS NULL AND "ShipPostalCode" LIKE :ShipPostalCode_Like ESCAPE '\' AND "ShipCountry" = :ShipCountryAND "ShipCountry" IS NULL AND "ShipCountry" LIKE :ShipCountry_Like ESCAPE '\'
